name: Royal Heights
description:
Royal Heights is a Game which mix BattleRoyal and Platformer genre! You can Create a Game or Join a Game!

How to play : _ “E” to Open Chests and Loot Spells

_ “Space” to Jump.

_ WASD to move.

_ Left Click to cast a Spell.

_ 1,2,3,4,5 to choose a spell in the bar.

www.twitch.tv/warlegend
